text: Jorge Fonseca (born 30 October 1992) is a Portuguese judoka. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's 100 kg event, in which he was eliminated in the second round by Lukáš Krpálek. In 2019, he won the gold medal at the 2019 World Judo Championships in Tokyo. == Personal life == On 2015, after he got injured on his left knee ligament, doctors found a malignant tumor os his left leg. Later on, he won the battle against cancer. ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Portugal Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:World judo champions Category:European Games competitors for Portugal Category:Judoka at the 2015 European Games Category:Judoka at the 2019 European Games Category:European Games medalists in judo Category:European Games bronze medalists for Portugal
title: Jorge Fonseca
